remarks: Value of a complex number raised to an integer power minus one. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)
statement:
expcld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
sqrecd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A =/= 0 ) $.
expclzd.3 $e |- ( ph -> N e. ZZ ) $.
expm1d $p |- ( ph -> ( A ^ ( N - 1 ) ) = ( ( A ^ N ) / A ) ) $.
